TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Emily M Perry, 12-23-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Emily M. Perry, December 23, 1831. Mrs. Holley. Shipping.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 725

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Emily M. Perry, December 23, 1831. Mrs. Holley. Shipping.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-23-1831">Decr. 23. 183*/date_mentioned*1*/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I remained at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Henry*/person_mentioned*s */location_mentioned*during the bad weather—my face and jaws were quite painful owing to riding down in the damp air— I am not yet rid of the mercury— A more lovely or beautiful *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* than *person_mentioned*Henry*/person_mentioned*s I have never seen in all my life— his eldest *person_mentioned*daughter*/person_mentioned* goes with *person_mentioned*Mrs Holley*/person_mentioned*— they are all very anxious to see you and sent their love— *person_mentioned*Mrs H.*/person_mentioned* will remove here as soon as she can arrange her affairs— She is a very superior *person_mentioned*woman */person_mentioned*and the most agreeable company I have met with for many years*/p*
*p*I have not seen *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned* and suppose he has gone up, Tell him to call on *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*for the Cattle—there are two yoke of oxen amongst them also a mare— he will have to find *person_mentioned*hands */person_mentioned*to hunt them up I have written to *person_mentioned*W*/person_mentioned*—abput it, and also left instructions before I started—*/p*
*p*No news of the Dart, or Elizabeth. The Spica is here and leaves *date_mentioned n="12-24-1832">tomorrow*/date_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Mrs Holley*/person_mentioned* will be down *date_mentioned n="12-23-1831">to day*/date_mentioned* to go in her to *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*remember me to *person_mentioned*Lavinia*/person_mentioned*— your *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
